title: Data Science Intern
description: • Developed a Data Quality Checker app using Python, SQL, and Snowflake to ensure 24/7 business validations on financial data, identifying outliers for review.• Conducted in-depth data analysis on portfolio data using Power BI and Python, investigating anomalies.• Completed three certification courses on data modeling for Snowflake data analysis and Datavault 2.0.

company: Herman Ostrow School of Dentistry of USC
title: Research Assistant
description: • Utilized computer vision techniques to separate teeth from STL scans for the AI & Orthodontics research group at Herman Ostrow School of Dentistry of USC.• Collaborated with team members to develop innovative solutions for patient scans, improving accuracy and efficiency.• Implemented cutting-edge technologies to streamline the process and eliminate the need for manual teeth annotation for each patient

title: Graduate Researcher
description: • Conducted research in the AI Impact on Government research group at the University of Southern California, analyzing AI's effects on federal jobs.• Utilized web scraping techniques to extract data from PDF files and cleaned the data for analysis.• Developed and implemented a custom system template using LLMs to classify and explain AI's impact on various government job roles.

title: Undergraduate Researcher
description: • Conducted independent research on Time Series Analysis under the supervision of Dr. Michael Tsiang at UCLA.• Developed a sequence-to-sequence LSTM model in PyTorch for stock prediction, overcoming non-stationary data challenges.• Utilized ARIMA modeling on Covid dataset, generating Bollinger Bands for trend visualization and exploring LOWESS models for predictions.

company: UC Berkeley College of Computing, Data Science, and Society
title: Software Developer, Team Lead
description: • Led a team in Mobile Development using Flutter with Dart, ensuring project progress and quality.• Contributed to the Algorithms team by coding unit-tests with pytest and pandas.• Attended team-lead meetings to oversee members' progress and ensure project alignment.

company: UC Berkeley College of Computing, Data Science, and Society
title: Software Developer
description: • Implemented serverside pagination for the Article Funnel at Public Editor to enhance user experience.• Developed functionality for administrators to manage article tags efficiently.• Created foundational functions to streamline operations for the UC Berkeley Division of Computing, Data Science, and Society.
